name: Pluto Kush
description: Pluto may no longer be a planet, but that doesnâ€™t debase the cosmic makeup of this charming indica. Debilitating sedation, commonly lamented by indica connoisseurs, is not a matter of contention for Pluto Kush, which thrives at providing instant physical relief while maintaining steady cerebral stimulation. The fluffy, soft flowers emanate a pungent aroma indicative of the strong, pleasant medicinal effects it administers.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Sleepy, Creative, Hungry, Relaxed, Insomnia, Pain, Stress, Depression, Nausea, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy
